thread.section_title: Centauro Rent a Car opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Centauro Rent a Car | centauro.net
thread.title: P BC
thread.title_full: Centauro Rent a Car evaluado por P BC

author: P BC
title: P BC
text: We have lived in Spain for 4 months now and have used Centauro twice now and can't fault anything. First time we had a brand new Fiesta and had no issues whatsoever, second time we went to the next level of car for an extra 3 Euros and when we arrived at the Car Rental office we were informed that we had been upgraded (for free) to a Fiat 500L which is one of the finest cars I have ever driven in my 48 years. The staff are very friendly and efficient and I have no hesitation in recommending Centauro Torrevieja to anyone who will listen. We look forward to hiring a car from them again maybe next time I will get an upgrade to a Porsche 911 (you can always dream)
